attributes.action: Give the public a general election and a future vote on who is prime minister.
attributes.additional_details:
sources
https://evolvepolitics.com/boris-johnson-appoints-disgraced-anti-lgbt-pro-death-penalty-brexiteer-priti-patel-as-home-secretary/

https://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/priti-patel-home-secretary-profile_uk_5d388ca8e4b0419fd336ee1a

This already looks bad for everyone & for the future of all we need the right to vote the PM as a UK where the public not a part vote for who they want to run the country.
We need the people running things have everyone's interests in mind and not their own.
attributes.background:
one day in boris johnsons PM role and hes appointed an anti lgbt, pro death penalty home secretary.
This is not what we want as a progressive country and we need someone who is fair & balanced to run the country who has everyone's need's in a positive stance, regardless of gender,sexuality race etc
